marketplaces.name: comfygit-marketplace
marketplaces.description: ComfyGit plugins for ComfyUI environment management
marketplaces.repo_description: ComfyGit monorepo containing the core libraries, CLI tools, and deployment utilities for managing ComfyUI environments.

files.README.md: # ComfyGit [![Documentation](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-comfygit.org-blue)](https://docs.comfygit.org/) [![License: AGPL-3.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-AGPL--3.0-blue.svg)](LICENSE.txt) [![Discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-%235865F2.svg?logo=discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/2h5rSTeh6Y) Git for your ComfyUI environments ‚Äî version control, package management, and reproducible sharing. ## Highlights - üîÑ **Isolated environments** ‚Äî test new nodes without breaking production - üì¶ **Git-based versioning** ‚Äî commit changes, rollback when things break - üöÄ **One-command sharing** ‚Äî export/import complete working environments - üíæ **Smart model management** ‚Äî content-addressable index, no duplicate storage - üîß **Standard tooling** ‚Äî built on UV and pyproject.toml, works with Python ecosystem - üñ•Ô∏è **Cross-platform** ‚Äî Windows, Linux, macOS ## Installation ```bash # With UV (recommended) uv tool install comfygit # Or with pip pip install comfygit ``` Need UV? See [UV installation](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/). ## Quick Start ```console $ cg init Initialized ComfyGit workspace at ~/comfygit $ cg create my-project --use Created environment 'my-project' Active environment: my-project $ cg node add comfyui-impact-pack Resolving comfyui-impact-pack... Installing ComfyUI-Impact-Pack from registry + comfyui-impact-pack@1.2.3 $ cg commit -m "Initial setup with Impact Pack" [main a28f333] Initial setup with Impact Pack 1 file changed, 15 insertions(+) $ cg run Starting ComfyUI at http://localhost:8188 ``` See the [documentation](https://docs.comfygit.org/getting-started/installation/) for more examples including version control workflows, sharing environments, and team collaboration. ## Documentation Full documentation at **[docs.comfygit.org](https://docs.comfygit.org/)** including: - [How It Works](https://docs.comfygit.org/getting-started/concepts/) ‚Äî architecture and design - [Model Management](https://docs.comfygit.org/user-guide/models/model-index/) ‚Äî content-addressable indexing - [Sharing Environments](https://docs.comfygit.org/user-guide/collaboration/export-import/) ‚Äî export/import and git remotes ## Features ### Environments ```bash cg create # Create new environment cg list # List all environments cg use # Set active environment cg status # Show environment state cg run # Run ComfyUI ``` ### Nodes ```bash cg node add # Add from registry cg node add # Add from GitHub cg node remove # Remove node cg node list # List installed nodes ``` ### Version Control ```bash cg commit -m "message" # Save snapshot cg log # View history cg revert # Undo a commit cg checkout # Explore old state ``` ### Sharing ```bash cg export # Export environment cg import # Import environment cg push / cg pull # Sync with git remote ``` ## Contributing Contributions welcome! See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details. - [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/comfygit-ai/comfygit/issues) ‚Äî bugs and features - [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/comfygit-ai/comfygit/discussions) ‚Äî questions and ideas - [Discord](https://discord.gg/2h5rSTeh6Y) ‚Äî community chat ## License ComfyGit is dual-licensed under [AGPL-3.0](LICENSE.txt) for open-source use and proprietary licenses for commercial use. See the [LICENSE.txt](LICENSE.txt) for more information.

plugins.name: comfygit
plugins.description: CLI and library for managing ComfyUI environments with version control and dependency management
